title: Jhin Q bounce Bug.
body: The bug happened while i was playing Jhin. Sometime when I use Jhin's Dancing Grenade, it happens to bounce 2 time and then disappear even though there are more targets after the second bounce and they are in range. I am Jhin main and I know that is not normal. The first time I mentioned the bug was a week ago and it happened 3-4 times. Today I played Jhin again and it happened again around 3-4 times. It usually happens when I throw it on a minion wave and after the second minion the grenade just disappears. I am looking forward on fixing the bug.

replies.body:
Morning ReaIm Of Shadows! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are looking to get a fix in ASAP.
